thread.title: Exeter Finance Corp. CEO Tom Anderson To Deliver Keynote Address At Auto Finance News' 'Auto Finance Summit 2015'
thread.title_full: Exeter Finance Corp. CEO Tom Anderson To Deliver Keynote Address At Auto Finance News' 'Auto Finance Summit 2015' - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Exeter Finance Corp. CEO Tom Anderson To Deliver Keynote Address At Auto Finance News' 'Auto Finance Summit 2015'
text:
Exeter Finance Corp.
IRVING, Texas , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Exeter Finance Corp. CEO Tom Anderson will deliver the Keynote Address at Auto Finance News' Auto Finance Summit (AFS) 2015 in Las Vegas on October 22 . Using his insights and the proven principals he has applied during his three decades in management and financial services, Anderson will offer his views on the challenges and opportunities within auto finance in his speech entitled "Facing Reality: A Newcomer's View on Auto Finance Opportunity."
"I'm hopeful that my experience outside the industry will help shape some new thinking around our current issues," Anderson said. "It is my intent to ignite fresh debate about some of the more consistent challenges in our industry, including innovation, ethics and compliance. I look forward to the opportunity to share my thoughts with my colleagues and in turn, discuss their top of mind issues."
The Auto Finance Summit is the largest conference on car leasing and lending in the world.
" Tom Anderson's unique experiences both in and out of auto finance will undoubtedly result in a provocative and educational address for all attendees," said JJ Hornblass, Executive Publisher, Auto Finance News. "We are thrilled to feature him as our keynote speaker for AFS 2015."
A finance industry veteran, Anderson was named CEO of Exeter Finance Corp., a specialty auto finance company based in Irving, Texas , in November 2014 . Prior to his tenure at Exeter, Anderson served as CEO of Education Dynamics LLC. He also served as CEO of Integrity Interactive Corporation, Upromise, and AmeriFee Financial.
Anderson will kick off the Auto Finance Summit at 9:00 AM PDT Thursday, October 22 . His prepared remarks will be followed by a question-and-answer session with attendees.
ABOUT EXETER FINANCE
Exeter Finance Corp. is a specialty auto finance company based in Irving, Texas . Exeter partners with franchised auto dealers throughout the country to make car ownership a reality for consumers. Providing auto ownership opportunities to credit challenged consumers, helping dealerships sell more vehicles and providing the highest level of service to dealers and customers have been keys to the company's success since its founding in 2006. Please visit www.exeterfinance.com to learn more.
ABOUT AUTO FINANCE NEWS
Auto Finance News is the flagship publication for the auto finance industry, and is the presenter of the Auto Finance Summit ( www.autofinancesummit.com ). Published since 1996, Auto Finance News is the nation's leading source for news, insights and analysis on automotive lending and leasing. Full of valuable data and exclusive market knowledge, the subscription service, which includes a monthly newsletter and a weekly email Update, guides its subscribers to better performance. For more information, please visit www.autofinancenews.net .
